item.title: X-XSS-Protection a security header gone wrong
item.description: In 2010 Chrome shipped a new feature, XSS Auditor, that would prevent unsafe parts of the website to be rendered. Together with XSS Auditor a new HTTP Header was introduced, with which its behaviour could be controlled.
